action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.
